name: Bhalla Industries
overview: Established in the year 1995, at Ludhiana (Punjab, India), we, “Bhalla Industries”, are noted as the renowned manufacturer and supplier of premium quality assortment of Nuts, Fasteners, Air Conditioning Copper Pipes and Flexible Copper Connectors. In our offered product range, we provide Collar Nuts, MS Nuts, MS Bolts, B-7 Studs, Automotive Fasteners and Components, Copper Air Conditioning Pipes, etc. Our offered product range is manufactured using the finest quality raw material and sophisticated technology in accordance with the international norms. These products are widely appreciated among clients for their salient features such as robust design, dimensional accuracy, excellent finish, easy installation and minimum maintenance. The offered range is available in various sizes, dimensions, patterns and other related specifications as per the variegated requirements of clients. Apart from this, the offered products can also be availed by our esteemed clients from us at the most affordable prices
